notification_content: Breach description PHI affected date of breach discovery date notification method and steps individual should take
Breach description PHI affected date of breach discovery date notification method and contact information
Verbal notification of breach PHI affected date of discovery and direction to call for written information
In-person delivery of breach notification letter with opportunity for questions
Publication in prominent media or posting on website if correct address not available after reasonable efforts
Notification if assessment determines significant risk of compromise exists
No notification required if assessment determines low probability of compromise
Primary method selected based on contact information available with backup methods if primary contact fails
Notification includes recommended protective steps credit monitoring information and information about HIPAA rights
Contact information for entity and OCR included for questions or to report concerns about breach response
